contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox Magazine| title = Xclusive ''Magazine''| image_file = | image_size = 200px || editor = Peter Anny-Nzekwue | frequency = Monthly | category = [[Lifestyle (sociology)|Lifestyle]]| company = | firstdate = 2006 | finaldate = - | finalnumber = - | country = [[Ireland]] | website = [http://www.xclusive.ie www.xclusive.ie] | }} '''''Xclusive Magazine''''' is [[Ireland]]'s first and only multicultural celebrity magazine. It is published in the first week of every month. ==About Xclusive Magazine== Xclusive Magazine...Ireland's African only lifestyle monthly and the first and only African magazine to break into the mainstream Irish media market. It is a 70-page full colour monthly, glossy, entertaining, newsworthy, thought-provoking and contemporary in look and appeal, with a highly experienced editorial team. It celebrates African people and affirms Ireland's multicultural life. It captures the world of entertainment and engages the readership with regular coverage, in pictures and titbits, of social, professional, fashion, religious, musical events and general lifestyle. The main readers of '''''Xclusive Magazine''''' are Africans and ethnic minority people in Ireland, but it is creatively packaged to appeal to everyone. Xclusive Magazine is sold in Eason's, African shops and most Newsagents all over Ireland, plus Belfast and London. == External links == * [http://www.xclusive.ie/23/jokafor.html Xclusive Interview] * [http://www.xclusive.ie/23/jiyke.html Xclusive Interview] * [http://www.marketing.ie/index.jsp?p=323&n=357&a=431 origins of Xclusive] [[Category:Monthly magazines]] [[Category:Entertainment magazines]] [[Category:Irish magazines]] {{entertainment-mag-stub}}
